secondaries.shortDescription: Score points if you destroy units in a melee attack, the bigger the beast, the bigger the points!

subObjectives.description: one or more CHARACTER or MONSTER units were destroyed by a melee attack made by a CREATIONS OF BILE model from your army this battle round.
one or more units (excluding CHARACTER, MONSTER or VEHICLE units) were destroyed by a melee attack made by a CREATIONS OF BILE model from your army this battle round.
if one or more ADEPTUS ASTARTES, SANCTIC ASTARTES or HERETIC ASTARTES units were destroyed by a melee attack made by a CREATIONS OF BILE model from your army during the battle
